entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Newmarket
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:06 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: King City North 01:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: WSW 24 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low zero. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
